questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A busy street scene
D) A family gathering

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A person
B) A building
C) The night sky and stars
D) A body of water

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) Stars
C) A mountain
D) A river

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Buildings
B) Mountains
C) The night sky and stars 
D) A lake

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) People
B) Trees
C) Animals
D) Cars

What natural element is prominently visible in the photo?
A) Water
B) Fire
C) Stars and trees
D) Snow

How clear is the sky in the photo?
A) moderate clear with many stars visible
B) Partly cloudy
C) Overcast with no stars visible
D) Completely clear with no stars visible

What is the lighting condition in the photo?
A) Bright daylight
B) Dim evening light
C) Artificial indoor lighting
D) Natural night light

What is the mood conveyed by the photo?
A) Energetic and lively
B) Calm and serene
C) Tense and dramatic
D) Chaotic and busy

What can be seen in the lower part of the photo?
A) A river
B) Trees
C) Buildings
D) Animals

What is the dominant color in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Green
C) Black and dark gray
D) Red

What is the primary subject of the photo?
A) People
B) Architecture
C) Nature
D) Animals

What kind of trees are seen in the photo?
A) Pine trees
B) Palm trees
C) Bare trees
D) Decidious trees

What is the primary visual element in the photo?
A) Color
B) Shape
C) Light
D) Texture

What is the main theme of the photo?
A) Urban life
B) Natural beauty
C) Historical significance
D) Technological advancement

What is the photo's perspective?
A) Aerial view
B) Ground level looking up
C) Eye level
D) Ground level looking down

What kind of scene is depicted in the photo?
A) Urban scene
B) Rural scene
C) Natural scene
D) Industrial scene

What is the clarity of the stars in the photo?
A) Very clear
B) Slightly blurry
C) Very blurry
D) Not visible

What is the spatial relationship between the trees and the sky?
A) Trees dominate the sky
B) Sky dominates the trees
C) Trees and sky are equally balanced
D) Trees are not visible

What is the focus of the photo?
A) Sharp focus
B) Soft focus
C) Out of focus
D) Selective focus

What is the main geometric shape visible in the photo?
A) Circle
B) Triangle
C) Square
D) No specific shape

What is the relationship between the stars and the trees in the photo?
A) Stars are more prominent than the trees
B) Trees are more prominent than the stars
C) Stars and trees are equally prominent
D) Stars and trees are not related

What is not visible in the photo?  
A) People \& Buildings  
B) Stars  
C) Trees  
D) Buildings

What is the color of the sky in the photo?
A) Blue
B) Orange
C) Black
D) Dark grey and black
